name: United Front (itch)
description:
United Front is an action puzzle bullet hell where players must constantly be moving and directing the power of their Cursor in order to keep their Mothership from being destroyed. 

Players have control over two main elements in the game - A Mothership (controlled by W and S) and the Cursor (controlled by the mouse) - and the goal of the game is to survive as long as possible and get the highest score using any means necessary.

The Mothership is heavy and slow, but armed with the only means of offense to the player. Meanwhile the Cursor is swift and agile, and comes with the ability to combine itself with most electronic object (including the Mothership itself) empowering or manipulating things to the benefit of the player. 

Using the theme of 'Joined Together' our team wanted the player to be challenged to reach the highest score knowing that the puzzle presented to them is what should they be prioritizing for both the highest score and survivability.

Submitted to the GMTK 2021 Game Jam
